You are training against a new SnapBot. It's been created to help players train their accuracy and timing in a snapshooting battle. If you can keep up with it, then you will be able to compete against the best.  

This is a fps paintball mini game. In tournament paintball there are many different aspects to the game: game plans, clock management, communication with teammates, coaching, etc. But the most atomic part of the game is the gun fight. Snapshooting is when a player "snaps" out from behind cover and takes a few quick shots at their opponent to either cause them to flinch and gain dominance or hit them.

Remember to switch hands. The gun should be in the hand of the side of the bunker you are leaning from.

Notes:

The quit doesn't work since this is a WebGL build of the game. On a PC it would quit to windows.
